lede: Gross Value Added (GVA) measures the contribution to the economy of each individual producer, industry or sector. In the UK it is used in the estimation of Gross Domestic Product (GDP).

bulletins.summary: Shows economic activity as measured by Gross Value Added (GVA) for English regions, Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland including component totals and industry group totals.
bulletins.name: Regional Gross Value Added (Income Approach), December 2013

datasets.summary: Economic activity as measured by Gross Value Added (GVA)
datasets.name: Regional GVA NUTS1

name: Gross Value Added (GVA)
